phone.title: Phone
phone.description: This is the phone number your account is linked to. It can be different from the app owner's phone.

data_description.token: Token that you received from [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) bot.

data_description.otp: Code that you just received from Telegram.

otp.title: OTP
otp.description: One time password is sent each time you logs in to the new app to protect your account.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password is only required if your account is secured with 2FA.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthentication
reauth_confirm.description: Press the button to start reauthentication process. You'll receive new OTP to submit on the next step.

send_message.name: Send message
send_message.description: Sends text message to user, group or bot.

target_username.name: Target username
target_username.description: User, channel, bot username or phone number.

message.name: Message
message.description: Message body. Optional if file is specified.

reply_to.name: Reply to message id
reply_to.description: Mark the message as a reply to a previous message. Also can be used to send a message in a specific group topic.

parse_mode.name: Parse mode
parse_mode.description: Parser for the message text. Disable to send as a plain text.

link_preview.name: Show link preview
link_preview.description: Enables previews for links in the message.

file.name: File
file.description: Path(s) to files relatively to config directory to attach to the message. Could be a single path or an array of paths.

force_document.name: Force document
force_document.description: Attach file(s) as document(s) rather than image/audio/video.

clear_draft.name: Clear draft
clear_draft.description: Clears draft message to selected target after sending the message.

keyboard.name: Keyboard
keyboard.description:
Button, list of buttons or list of lists of buttons to show under the message. E.g.

`button1`

```

- button1

- button2

- button3

```

```

- ['button1', 'button2', 'button3']

- ['button4', 'button5', 'button6']

```

inline_keyboard.name: Inline keyboard
inline_keyboard.description: Button, list of buttons or list of lists of buttons to show under the message.

keyboard_resize.name: Resize keyboard
keyboard_resize.description: Resizes keyboard to minimize space used. Can be used only if `keyboard` is defined.

keyboard_single_use.name: Single use keyboard
keyboard_single_use.description: Hides keyboard after user press any button. Can be used only if `keyboard` is defined.

supports_streaming.name: Support streaming
supports_streaming.description: Whether the sent video supports streaming or not.

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.description: Schedule message delivery. Can be used only in `client` mode. Bots can't schedule message delivery.

comment_to.name: Comment to
comment_to.description: Similar to `reply_to`, but replies in the linked group of a broadcast channel instead.

nosound_video.name: Nosound video
nosound_video.description: Displays video without audio track as a video. Otherwise Telegram will attempt to display such video as an animated gif.
